info.name: Modern tumblr
info.description: This style flattens tumblr for a more minimalistic style, much like that of Windows 8's tiled UI.
info.additionalInfo: 18/7/2014:- ~Major fixes that may have made tumblr unusable with this style with an update to tumblr's code >Various changes were made to the .clearfix properties so as to prevent future similar issues. ~URL lists and REGEX updated so as to work with tumblr's change of pages from http to https ~Search page updated so that the header, at long last, now matches the page colour 19/6/2014:- ~XKit support now added! Formats include: >XKit overlay is now almost borderless, matching the rest of the style >Minor colour scheme changes to extension menus >Buttons tweaked and split into three seperate blocks for 'update,' 'uninstall,' etc. >Inactive blog finder styled >CleanFeed styled (bigger indicator, no border, circular indicator) ~New post buttons have had the faint divider removed. The dashboard tweaks can now be considered complete until any further changes are made on tumblr's part. ~Minor changes to 'followers' page. 21/1/2014:- ~'Customise' page is now styled 12/1/2014:- ~Tumblr has a new-look settings page, the theme has been updated to reflect this ~'Spotlight' page styled ~'People you know' page styled ~'Following' page styled 11/1/2014:- ~Search page added: this means that all basic functionality pages are fully integrated (excluding some help documents) ~Minor changes to other areas of the site 8/1/2014:- ~Changed method for the reblog and new post pages to fix a bug where the style would sometimes revert to tumblr's original, either on the overlay or the dashboard itself. ~Removed more speech markers ~Minor tweaks to the 'Activity' page ~Added new post tweaks to sub-blog timelines 7/1/2014:- ~All help pages under the 'features' category have been fully altered and configured, other help pages are messy at present, but still readable. Other pages are being configured in future updates. ~Help landing page fully configured ~Changes to the reblog menu to make it more consistent with the rest of the style ~Changes to new post menus to make them more consistent with the rest of the style ~Other minor tweaks 28/12/2013:- ~Radar updated to look more consistent ~All borders removed on the dashboard, margins increased to aid readability with this removal ~Minor tweaks to blog settings page ~Removed 'aggregate view' message from inbox to fix display inconsistency ~Other minor tweaks ~Screenshot updated ~Added additional screenshots 27/12/2013:- ~Updates to the activities page makes the selected graph element a block colour, no more gradient. ~Removed segoe ui font from code to resolve some issues with icon drawing in Chrome. 20/12/2013:- ~Fixed a bug where viewing own blog on the dashboard would revert to the original theme ~Added edits specific to Activity logs, including border removal and slight colour changes ~Used regular expressions in order to improve functionality in some browsers ~Fixed bug that caused icons to become random characters in chrome ~Stopped the return to top button from changing opacity - as originally intended ~Changed the backing colour of new 'Radar' to match that of the search bar ~Changed display function of blog gradients to be '!important.' The gradients should now appear under no circumstance ~Minor improvements to the settings pages: >Borders removed >'chrome' buttons changed to fit colour scheme >Navigation bar made to be more clean ~Changes to the blog settings pages: >Fixed an issue with background not displaying correctly >Right border of navigation panel selection removed, resulting in a more flush appearance >Fixed a bug that would cause clearfix to break when editing content 19/12/2013:- ~Fixed an issue where a gradient would be displayed behind suggested blogs. 17/12/2013:- ~Initial release
